sections.heading: 3.2 Experiment
sections.text: Consider the information context of the actors, which includes all relevant relationships as well as the interaction history, in which Yahoo! search engines are not able to use specific information, especially context information, and simply use full-text index search in web snippets. In the experiment, we use a maximum of 1000 snippets for search terms representing an actor. Web snippets generate the word list for each actor and output very rare words due to the variety of his vocabulary. sections.heading: 4 Conclusion
sections.text: The overlap-based approach has the potential to be integrated into existing methods for extracting personal characteristics such as keywords. It shows how to find a keyword by exploiting snippets of web and hit numbers. In the near future, we will compare some methods to explore the possibility of improving this method.
